meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sour.
meanings.sent1: The sournesses of the lemon made my face scrunch up.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the sournesses of the vinegar in the salad dressing.
meanings.sent3: The sournesses of the unripe fruit made everyone pucker their lips.
meanings.sent4: The sournesses of the situation left a bitter taste in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The sournesses of the pickles lingered on my tongue.

meanings.definition: The taste or sensation of being sour.
meanings.sent1: Her face twisted in response to the sournesses of the candy.
meanings.sent2: The sournesses of the yogurt caught me by surprise.
meanings.sent3: The sournesses of the unexpected news left a sour taste in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: The sournesses of the lemonade were like a burst of tartness.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the sournesses of the grapefruit on my taste buds.
